item.title: Alagu Varshini Urges Effective Implementation of Aspirational Blocks Programme in Gattu Mandal
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Gadwal: The District Nodal Officer for the Aspirational Blocks Programme (ABP) and Deputy Secretary of the Union Ministry of Rural Development, Alagu Varshini, has called upon district officials to ensure the successful implementation of the Aspirational Blocks Programme being carried out in Gattu Mandal of the district.
As part of the initiative being implemented under the supervision of NITI Aayog, Gattu Mandal was selected as an Aspirational Block. On Monday, Officer Alagu Varshini visit...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Cotton Procurement by CCI Begins in Gadwal; Farmers Struggle to Book Slots Due to ginning mills Shortage
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The Cotton Corporation of India (CCI) has officially begun cotton procurement operations in Jogulamba Gadwal district. The inauguration ceremony took place at the Sri Balaji Cotton Ginning Mill, where Marketing Department Officer Pushpamma formally launched the procurement alongwith Rahul the CPO of CCI by breaking a coconut in traditional fashion.
According to officials, the district is expecting a yield of around 18 lakh quintals of cotton this season. Currently, only two procurement ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
